Package instructionpattrns

Class AddressInstructionPattern

java.lang.Object
instructionpattrns.InstructionPattern
instructionpattrns.AddressInstructionPattern
public class AddressInstructionPattern extends InstructionPattern
Represents an instruction pattern for matching instructions that involve addresses, using either direct (e.g. JMP 12345678) or indirect (e.g. MOV EAX, [EDX+10]) addressing modes.

  • Constructor Details

    • AddressInstructionPattern

      public AddressInstructionPattern(String mnemonic, Class<ghidra.program.model.address.GenericAddress> genericAddressClass)
      Creates an instruction pattern for matching instructions involving an address and using direct addressing mode (e.g. CALL <any address%gt;).
      Parameters:
      mnemonic - The mnemonic of the instruction to match.
      genericAddressClass - The class type for matching generic address.

    • AddressInstructionPattern

      public AddressInstructionPattern(String mnemonic, ghidra.program.model.listing.Function function, boolean matchThunks)
      Creates an instruction pattern for matching instructions involving a function and using direct addressing mode (e.g. CALL %lt;some function%gt;).
      Parameters:
      mnemonic - The instruction mnemonic to match.
      function - The function involved in the instruction.
      matchThunks - Whether or not to match thunks associated with the function.

    • AddressInstructionPattern

      public AddressInstructionPattern(String mnemonic, String destinationRegister, String sourceRegister, Long scalarOffset)
      Creates an instruction pattern for matching instructions involving two registers and an offset, and using direct addressing mode (e.g. LEA EAX, [EDX + 0ch]).
      Parameters:
      mnemonic - The instruction mnemonic to match.
      destinationRegister - The destination (first) register.
      sourceRegister - The source (second) register.
      scalarOffset - The offset to use with respect to the source register value.

    • AddressInstructionPattern

      public AddressInstructionPattern(String mnemonic, String destinationRegister, String sourceRegister, Class<ghidra.program.model.scalar.Scalar> scalarClass)
      Creates an instruction pattern for matching instructions involving two registers and any offset, and using direct addressing mode (e.g. MOV ECX, [EDX + %lt;any scalar offset%gt;]).
      Parameters:
      mnemonic - The instruction mnemonic to match.
      destinationRegister - The destination (first) register.
      sourceRegister - The source (second) register.
      scalarClass - The Scalar class type.

  • Method Details

    • getScalarOffset

      public Long getScalarOffset()
      Returns the actual scalar offset value used by the matching instruction (in the case of indirect addressing).
      Returns:
      The scalar offset as a Long value, if the instruction matched the pattern successfully; otherwise, null.

    • matchesImpl

      public boolean matchesImpl(ghidra.program.model.listing.Instruction inst, ghidra.program.model.lang.InstructionContext instContext, ghidra.program.model.lang.InstructionPrototype instProto)
      Checks if the provided instruction matches this instruction pattern. This function handles direct addressing instructions.
      Parameters:
      inst - The instruction to be checked.
      instContext - The instruction context of the instruction.
      instProto - The instruction prototype of the instruction.
      Returns:
      true if the instruction matches the instruction pattern, false otherwise.
